spells.name: Animal Messenger
spells.description: Sends a Tiny animal to a specific place.

spells.name: Delay Poison
spells.description: Stops poison from harming subject for 1 hour/level.

spells.name: Detect Animals or Plants
spells.description: Detects kinds of animals or plants.

spells.name: Detect Poison
spells.description: Detects poison in one creature or object.

spells.name: Endure Elements
spells.description: Exist comfortably in hot or cold regions.

spells.name: Jump
spells.description: Subject gets bonus on Acrobatics checks.

spells.name: Longstrider
spells.description: Your base speed increases by 10 ft.

spells.name: Magic Fang
spells.description: One natural weapon of subject creature gets +1 on attack and damage rolls.

spells.name: Resist Energy
spells.description: Ignores 10 (or more) points of damage/attack from specified energy type.

spells.name: Summon Nature's Ally I
spells.description: Summons creature to fight for you.
